title: PUBLISHERS WEEKLY Bestsellers
text:
The Canadian Press - ONLINE EDITION PUBLISHERS WEEKLY Bestsellers 
Copyright 5/8/2015 Publishers Weekly. Week ending 10/18/2015, powered by Nielsen Bookscan 5/8/2015 The Nielsen Company. 
HARDCOVER FICTION 
1. "See Me" by Nicholas Sparks (Grand Central Publishing) 
2. "The Survivor" by Flynn/Mills (Atria/Bestler) 
3. "The Murder House" by James Patterson and David Ellis (Little, Brown) 
4. "A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms" by George R.R. Martin (Bantam) 
5. "The Girl in the Spider's Web" by David Lagercrantz (Knopf) 
6. "City on Fire" by Garth Risk Hallberg (Knopf) 
7. "Go Set a Watchman" by Harper Lee (Harper) 
8. "Come Rain or Come Shine" by Jan Karon (G.P. Putnam's Sons) 
9. "The Girl on the Train" by Paula Hawkins (Riverhead) 
10. "Dashing Through the Snow" by Debbie Macomber (Ballantine) 
11. "Foreign Affairs" by Stuart Woods (Putnam) 
12. "Make Me" by Lee Child (Delacorte Press) 
13. "All the Stars in the Heavens" by Adriana Trigiani (Harper) 
14. "After You" by Jojo Moyes (Pamela Dorman Books) 
15. "Hell's Foundations Quiver" by David Weber (Tor) 
HARDCOVER NONFICTION 
1. "Killing Reagan" by Bill O'Reilly (Holt) 
2. "Humans of New York:Stories" by Brandon Stanton (St. Martin's Press) 
3. "A More Perfect Union" by Ben Carson (Penguin/Sentinel) 
4. "The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up" by Marie Kondo (Ten Speed) 
5. "The Power of I Am" by Joel Osteen (Hachette/FaithWords) 
6. "M Train" by Patti Smith (Knopf) 
7. "Farmhouse Rules" by Nancy Fuller (Grand Central Life & Style) 
8. "A Common Struggle" by Kennedy/Fried (Penguin/Blue Rider) 
9. "Agents of Babylon" by David Jeremiah (Tyndale) 
10. "Big Magic" by Elizabeth Gilbert (Riverhead) 
11. "Why Not Me?" by Mindy Kaling (Crown Archetype) 
12. "Wake Up Happy" by Michael Strahan (Atria/37 Ink) 
13. "Good Profit" by Charles G. Koch (Crown Business) 
14. "Between the World and Me" by Ta-Nehisi Coates (Random/Spiegel & Grau) 
15. "The Last of the President's Men" by Bob Woodward (Simon & Schuster) 
MASS MARKET PAPERBACKS 
1. "Deadline" by John Sanford (Berkley) 
2. "The Martian" (movie tie-in) by Andy Weir (Broadway) 
3. "Gray Mountain" by John Grisham (Dell) 
4. "Cold Cold Heart" by Tami Hoag (Signet) 
5. "Willow Brook Road" by Sherryl Woods (Harlequin, MIRA) 
6. "Hope to Die" by James Patterson (Hachette/Vision) 
7. "Mr. Miracle" by Debbie Macomber (Ballantine) 
8. "Trading Christmas" by Debbie Macomber (Mira) 
9. "Double Down: The Men Of The Sisterhood ?1" by Fern Michaels (Zebra) 
10. "Evergreen Springs" by RaeAnne Thayne (Harlequin HQN) 
11. "The Escape" by David Baldacci (Hachette/Vision) 
12. "Long, Tall Christmas" by Janet Dailey (Kensington/Zebra) 
13. "The Hidden" by Heather Graham (Harlequin, MIRA) 
14. "The Cinderella Murder" by Clak/Burke (S&S/Pocket) 
15. "Down the Rabbit Hole" by J.D. Robb, Mary Blaney, Elaine Fox, Mary Kay McComas and R.C. Ryan (Jove) 
TRADE PAPERBACKS 
1. "The Martian" by Andy Weir (Broadway) 
2. "The Walking Dead Compendium Volume 3" by Robert Kirkman and Charlie Adlard (Image Comics) 
3. "The Martian" (movie tie-in) by Andy Weir (Broadway) 
4. "Grey" by E.L. James (Vintage) 
5. "Memory Man" by David Baldacci (Grand Central Life & Style) 
6. "How Can It Be Gluten-Free Cookbook Vol. 2" (America's Test Kitchen) 
7. "Fervent" by Priscilla Shirer (B&H) 
8. "100 Deadly Skills" by Clint Emerson (S&S/Touchstone) 
9. "Stress Relieving Patterns" (Blue Star) 
10. "I Am Malala" by Malala Yousafzai (LB/Back Bay) 
11. "Owls Coloring Book" by Majorie Sarnat (Dover) 
12. "Creative Cats Coloring Book" by Marjorie Sarnat (Dover) 
13. "The 5 Love Languages" by Gary Chapman (Moody/Northfield) 
14. "The Battle Plan for Prayer" by Stephen Kendrick (B&H) 
15. "Owls Coloring Book" by Majorie Sarnat (Dover)
